column4: I swear I'm doing everything in my power to do this right, but my Ubuntu box will not acknowledge any keys in my authorized_keys2 file. The permissions of my .ssh directory and everything in it is 600. My public keys are single lines beginning with ssh-rsa. I've tried authorized_keys and authorized_keys2. I've restarted the daemon every time I've changed my config file. public key authentication is on, password auth is off, pam is off,
My client is a Windows machine and I've tried using Putty and Bitvise Tunneller
